title: You are ineligible to earn loot due to previous behavioral restrictions!!?
body:
Hey there, everytime I finish a game I get the pop up message of "You are ineligible to earn loot due to previous behavioral restrictions" and I do not know why I am getting this and I am wondering can anyone provide more information on this? 
And I am wondering there any way to remove this a gain loot again? 

Any help is appreciated and Thank you in advance!!

replies.body:
Basically this appears after you have been punished (chat restriction or temp ban). While you are on the punishment and for a period of time afterwards you will be unable to earn hextech loot (since it is a reward for positive play). 

That period of time is not strictly defined, though if the punishment was only a 10 game chat restriction then with good behaviour it can be as short as a week before you get loot privileges back. Obviously harsher punishments will extend that time significantly.

So basically, just keep playing, be positive, and you will start getting loot again fairly soon.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions
